nodes.documentation:
@title Registry contract to store registered modules
@notice Only Polymath can register and verify module factories to make them available for issuers to attach.
nodes.name: ModuleRegistry

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPausedOrOwner

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused and ignore is msg.sender is owner.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.name: removeModule

nodes.name: transferOwnership
